mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHARE_HOUSE (BOARD_NO, HOUSE_ADDRESS, HOUSE_LATITUDE, HOUSE_LONGITUDE, INFORMATION, THUMBNAIL) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{houseAddress}, #{houseLatitude}, #{houseLongitude}, #{information}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ROOM_IMAGE WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL

SELECT BOARD.BOARD_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, HOUSE_LATITUDE, HOUSE_LONGITUDE, THUMBNAIL, HOUSE_ADDRESS, (SELECT MIN(RENT) FROM ROOM WHERE BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO ) MIN_AMOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISH_LIST WHERE BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO AND USER_NO = #{userNo}) WISH FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN SHARE_HOUSE ON SHARE_HOUSE.BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO WHERE CATEGORY_U_NO = '2' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOUR (ROOM_NO, USER_NO, MOVE_IN, ENQUIRY) VALUES (#{roomNo}, #{userNo}, #{moveIn}, #{enquiry})
